Articles.Content:
can you animate models? like deploying wings/arms in space, or landing gears/legs upon return to kearth?

Gav
No. The Wiki clearly stated it's not yet supported. But I think the Wiki is still down.

it was yesterday when i went a lookin'

Gav

for clarity's sake - no, animated models aren't yet supported - last time i talked to HarvesteR about this, he said that's mostly because he didn't get around to working out a cfg interface to define that just yet....

i don't think any of the supported formats can hold animation info - if that were the case, we'd probably have that all set by now :
